eligibility:
Eligibility for the programme is a pass with a minimum of 60% at the +2 level (Karnataka PUC / ISC / CBSE / NIOS / State Boards) in either Commerce or Sciences stream from any recognised Board in India.
Candidates writing the +2 examinations in March-May 2025 may apply with their class X and XI marks. Students pursuing International curriculum must note that eligibility is according to AIU stipulations: •    Applicants pursuing IB curriculum must have 3 HL and 3 SL with 24 credits. •    Applicants pursuing GCE / Edexcel must have a minimum of 3 A levels with a grade not less than C.
